attributes.action: Force local bus companies to provide bus services on the grounds of where they are needed as opposed to cost and give metro the teeth they need in order to sanction bus companies and stop fare increases where they are unwarrented
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bus companies must be made to serve the public, not the share holder. There is no point having a local passneger transport authority if they cannot force companies to provide services where ever they are needed and at a reasonable cost
